title: 'The most important YES in my life': Man City star Oleksandr Zinchenko proposes to his girlfriend
text:
A good week just got even better for Ukraine and Manchester City star Oleksandr Zinchenko as he proposed to his TV presenter girlfriend and she said yes.

On Monday, the 22-year-old helped his side to Euro 2020 qualification with a win over Portugal at his country's national stadium in Kiev.

Today, the midfielder got down on one knee at the same stadium and proposed to stunning Vlada Sedan, a broadcaster for Football 1/2 in her home country.

The midfielder got down on one knee at the national stadium and proposed to Vlada Sedan

'The most important YES in my life,' wrote an elated Zinchenko alongside a picture of his wife to be planting a kiss on him beside a huge bed of roses, while both of them wore the national football shirt.

Rumours of a romance with the 21-year-old were sparked earlier this year when Zinchenko kissed the presenter after an interview following Ukraine's 5-0 win over Serbia in June.

After his side's win against Ronaldo's Portugal on Monday, he was at it again. This time gatecrashing a team-mate's interview.

TV presenter Vlada Sedan posted this image to her Instagram, of the pair in the national arena

The presenter has popped up at City training and matches, and the pair's Instagram pages are littered with couple pictures.

Just last month Sedan was in Manchester - posting a picture of herself with City boss Pep Guardiola on Instagram to her near-200k followers.

Zinchenko was part of the side that beat Portugal 2-1 in Kyiv on Monday night following goals from Roman Yaremchuk and Andriy Yarmolenko.

The win strengthened Ukraine's standing at the top of Group B and also confirmed the nation's qualification for next summer's tournament.

Zinchenko broke interview protocol with TV reporter Sedan when Ukraine beat Serbia 5-0

Oleksandr Zinchenko with girlfriend Vlada Sedan after Ukraine qualify for Euro 2020
description: On Monday, Zinchenko helped his side to Euro 2020 qualification with a win over Portugal in Kiev and his week got even better when his girlfriend, Vlada Sedan, agreed to marry him.
